Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Lake View Hotel in Beijing (South Chaoyang), you'll be convenient to Longtan Park and Hongqiao Market. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of Panjiayuan Antique Market and Beijing Curio City.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 307 air-conditioned rooms featuring LCD televisions. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find an indoor pool and a fitness center. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, wedding services, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 5 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and express check-in. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center, conference space, and meeting rooms.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at noon Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 5 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Longtan Park - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Panjiayuan Antique Market - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Beijing Curio City - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Beijing International Tennis Center - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Hongqiao Market - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Echo Wall - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Tiantan Park - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Temple of Heaven - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Beijing University of Technology Gymnasium - 3.3 km / 2 mi
Today Art Museum - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Scitech Plaza - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi
Ancient Observatory - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi
Silk Street Market - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
Beijing Yansha Outlets - 3.8 km / 2.4 mi
China World Trade Center - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi

The preferred airport for Lake View Hotel is Shanghai (PVG-Pudong Intl.) - 1,083.9 km / 673.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
